subject: p16662264
History: Renal transplant with multifocal pneumonia with new left-sided pleuritic chest pain.
Findings: Again seen is the right middle lobe infiltrate. There is also left lingular infiltrate that is slightly increased in conspicuity compared to prior. There are small bilateral pleural effusions that have increased compared to prior. The patchy upper lobe infiltrate seen on CT is not as well visualized on the chest x-ray.
